prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that can camouflage itself in its surroundings.
Show me a cute Pokemon with a blue body and a bright yellow fin.
Design a Pokemon that has the ability to blend into wetland environments.
Imagine a small, timid Pokemon that loves to hide in the rain.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a small amphibian with big expressive eyes.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a baby lizard, with a gentle personality.
Make a character design for a water-type starter Pokemon with a playful nature.

distinctive_features: Small fin-like appendage on the head
